episodes.author: Kurt Metzger and Sherrod Small
episodes.summary:
Everything was going fine until Sherrod instigated me and Yami got mad and we fought and then made up. So free episode is post fight. Bonus episode is fight. Why? Because if someone wants to make problems after hearing two friends fight, they can pay us three bucks a month, that's why. It's intimate. Titties came out. Yes, it's pretty intense fight, but I will state for the record it's an honor to lose to my talented friend Yaminieka who is always funny and a good hang. Love Kurt Metzger

Also, former cop Scott Coscia is back to talk about the Manhattan dumpster bomb that literally hit too close to home for him. Check it out.

The guys also talk about Barry's stand up dates in Boston and his upcoming special "Whatever Threatens You" available soon on LouisCK.net.

Check it out.

episodes.title: Best Of Vol. 1
episodes.author: Kurt Metzger and Sherrod Small
episodes.summary: Race Wars has been going strong since 2013 and we've compiled some of the best moments from the show's history including the first performance of 'The Ceremony', drunk Trump, Gavin McInnes getting a phone thrown at his head, and Tracy Morgan. Check it out!

episodes.title: Millenium Soul Plane w/ Dan Naturman & Kareem Green
episodes.author: Kurt Metzger and Sherrod Small
episodes.summary:
On this week's episode of Race Wars, Kurt and Sherrod are joined by comics Dan Naturman, Kareem Green, and Edward Ferrell, and Vocativ deputy editor, Erin Gloria Ryan, to talk about Star Wars: The Force Awakens, Edward getting punched at an open mic for using the N-word in a joke, Cleopatra's race, The Friend Zone, Twitter hate, and a lot more. Check it out.

http://comedyvoices.com

episodes.title: RIP Barbara V. w/ Neil Casey
episodes.author: Kurt Metzger and Sherrod Small
episodes.summary: Philly Girl meets her match this week on Race Wars as Neil Casey (star of the new Ghostbusters movie) comes in as Delaware Dude. The crew also get a call from a fan in Egypt and talk about racism in prison and To Catch a Predator. This episode of Race Wars is dedicated to Sherrod's wonderful mother, Barbara.

episodes.title: Sicilian Late w/ Artie Lange and Gina Yashere
episodes.author: Kurt Metzger and Sherrod Small
episodes.summary: Another classic Uncle Artie episode as Kurt and Sherrod welcome Artie Lange and Gina Yashere into the studio. Kurt blasts Madison, WI after finding out why he was banned from their comedy club years ago and Gina accuses Russell Peters of stealing a bunch of her material. Plus, Bob DiBuono is back as Rich Vos!  The guys also get a drop in from Nate Bargatze and Alex Edelman.

Plus, Dave Weiss from the podcast Deep Inside The Rabbit Hole shows up at the end to talk about 9/11 and how the Earth is flat. Check it out.

Check out all of our great shows at http://standupnylabs.com

The crew talk about white guys with dreads and how Annie got molested by her art teacher.  Plus, Go-to Gay Tommy does a segment on Azealia Banks and the use of the word "faggot."  Also, drunk Dr. Phil (Bob Dibuono) is in the studio and Managing Editor of Jezebel, Erin Gloria Ryan.
